Practical use cases

These are common real-world AI patterns. The question is not “can we do it”. The question is “can we govern it safely”.

Choose a use case

Search

Use AI to help users find relevant information, with grounding in known sources.

Risks

  • Hallucinations if answers are not grounded.
  • Privacy leakage if prompts include sensitive info.
  • Silent failure when the query is ambiguous.

Controls

  • Citations to source content
  • Fallback to keyword search
  • Logs of queries and failure cases
Impact if wrongMedium

Risk is Medium. A lightweight AI assist can be appropriate if privacy and evaluation are handled.

Enterprise adoption cues

  • Decide ownership and escalation paths before launch.
  • Choose evaluation metrics aligned to harms and value.
  • Plan for drift: monitoring, rollback, and change control.
  • Keep data minimised and well governed.
